import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '../../components/ui/Card'; import Button from '../../components/ui/Button'; import Input from '../../components/ui/Input'; import Modal from '../../components/ui/Modal'; import { UserCog, Plus, Search, Edit, Trash2, Mail, Phone, MapPin, IdCard } from 'lucide-react'; const StaffManagementPage = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [isAddModalOpen, setIsAddModalOpen] = useState(false); // Mock data - replace with actual API calls const staff = [ { id: 1, firstName: 'Sarah', fatherName: 'Johnson', grandfatherName: 'Smith', username: 'sarah.johnson', email: 'sarah.johnson@example.com', phone: '+1234567890', fanNumber: 'FAN001', address: '123 Staff Street, New York, NY 10001', role: 'staff', created_at: '2024-01-15', status: 'active', }, { id: 2, firstName: 'Michael', fatherName: 'Brown', grandfatherName: 'Davis', username: 'michael.brown', email: 'michael.brown@example.com', phone: '+1234567891', fanNumber: 'FAN002', address: '456 Admin Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90210', role: 'staff', created_at: '2024-01-10', status: 'active', }, { id: 3, firstName: 'Emily', fatherName: 'Wilson', grandfatherName: 'Taylor', username: 'emily.wilson', email: 'emily.wilson@example.com', phone: '+1234567892', fanNumber: 'FAN003', address: '789 Manager Blvd, Chicago, IL 60601', role: 'staff', created_at: '2024-01-20', status: 'inactive', }, ]; const filteredStaff = staff.filter( (member) => member.firstName.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || member.lastName?.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || member.username.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || member.email.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || member.fanNumber.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); return (
{/* Header */}

setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="pl-10" />

{/* Add Staff Modal */} setIsAddModalOpen(false)} title="Add New Staff Member" size="lg" >

Add staff functionality would be implemented here with a form containing:

  • First Name
  • Father Name
  • Grandfather Name
  • Username
  • Email
  • Password
  • Phone
  • FAN Number
  • Address
); }; export default StaffManagementPage;
